RunningInsideAnIde.comment: will pop up a small window to close the application

RunningInjUnitTest.comment: helpful,if jPac is run in a jUnit test

EnableTrace.comment: enables tracing of the module activity

StoreConfigOnShutdown.comment: if set,the configuration is stored on shutdown

TraceTimeMinutes.comment: used to estimate the length of the trace buffer [min]

pauseOnBreakPoint.comment: cycle is paused,until all modules enter waiting state

RemoteSignalsEnabled.comment: enable connections to/from remote JPac instances

RemoteSignalPort.comment: server port for remote signal access

storeHistogrammsOnShutdown.comment: enables storing of histogramm data on shutdown

HistogrammFile.comment: file in which the histogramms are stored

CyclicTaskShutdownTimeoutTime.comment: Timeout for all cyclic tasks to stop on shutdown [ns]

OpcUaServicePort.comment: port over which the opc ua service is provided

host.comment: Ip of the S7 plc which has to be logged

db.comment: DB inside the plc which holds the log buffer

plcPollTime.comment: cycle time used to poll the plc's log buffer [ms]

CleanupOnSave.comment: removes unused properties on next save(). !!! Will be automatically reset !!!
